name: Green Eggs & Ham Bites
description: You will like these in a house. You will like these with a mouse. You will like them here or there. You will like them anywhere. In a box. With a fox. In the rain. On a train. You will love green eggs and ham. You will love them, Sam I Am!

ingredients.name: unsalted nuts or seeds of your choice

preparation: Preheat oven to 400Â° F. Lightly brush two Muffin Makers with oil and place on Sheet Pan.
Line each Muffin Maker cavity with a slice of ham. The bottom and sides should be covered.
In a large bowl, whisk eggs with pesto. Carefully pour egg mixture over ham in muffin cavities.
Bake 15 min, or until eggs are set. Let cool slightly before removing bites from muffin cavities.
tips: To easily pour egg mixture into muffin cavities, use a measuring cup with a spout
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with a slice of multigrain bread with 2 tsp nut butter, and 1 cup berries.
